page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [GRA2][Web Hosting] - Cluster006
incidents.message: Start time : 08/11/2023 13:24 UTC Service impact : Slowness on some hosted websites Ongoing actions : Investigating Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

incidents.name: [EU][VoIP/Services] - Conferences
incidents.message: Start time : 07/11/2023 19:41 UTC End time : 07/11/2023 20:26 UTC Service status : Latency and errors were observed when creating a conference or when wanting to join a conference. Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on the network Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational. Related incident https://customer-service.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/jxw30sttghwk
